backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the portfolio backend, implementing blob storage, access control (admin/user roles), user profile management, and public query functions returning project data including titles, videos, and details.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four confirmed title-update changes: renaming roles in the Projects and Resume sections from 'Lead Unreal Engine Developer'/'Unreal Developer' to 'Lead Technical Designer'/'Technical Designer'.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source files to short summaries, serving as a reference document describing the purpose and key details of each frontend component, hook, and page.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML entry point for the React app, setting the page title to 'Game Design Portfolio Website' and mounting the app at the #root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component that composes the full portfolio layout (Header, Hero, Projects, About, Resume, Contact, Footer) with dark theme forced via next-themes; the Skills section is commented out but preserved.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section displaying a profile photo, a three-paragraph professional bio for Boyan (6 years experience), and a four-card skills grid covering Technical Design, Game Engines, Systems Design, and Cross-Functional Leadership.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section rendering email, location (Valencia, Spain), and LinkedIn in a single horizontal row with icon buttons and hover effects on a dark background.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Minimal footer displaying a copyright line with a heart icon and a link to caffeine.ai as the build tool.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Fixed navigation header with centered desktop nav links (Home, Projects, About, Resume, Contact) supporting smooth-scroll, and a slide-out Sheet menu for mobile viewports.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Full-screen hero section with a YouTube video background, animated cycling subtitles, scroll-based parallax/fade effects, and buttons to navigate to other sections.
frontend/src/components/Projects.tsx: Projects showcase section that renders a list of project cards with a modal detail view, embedding YouTube videos and linking to external URLs like ArtStation.
frontend/src/components/Resume.tsx: Resume section displaying work experience, education, and certifications as styled card lists with static hardcoded data.
frontend/src/components/Skills.tsx: Skills section that fetches skill names from the backend via a query hook and renders them in a responsive grid with mapped icons and descriptions, including a loading skeleton state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flow, identity persistence, and delegation validity checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data (projects, skills, user profile, admin status) using the actor from useActor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Tailwind directives and defines light/dark theme CSS custom properties (colors, radius, sidebar, charts) using OKLCH color space, plus utility animation classes (fade-in, slide-in).
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the app with QueryClientProvider (React Query) and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Empty file with no content; placeholder for an AdminPage component.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectDetail.tsx: Empty file with no content; placeholder for a ProjectDetail page component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that maps OKLCH CSS variables to semantic color tokens, extends spacing/font sizes, and registers typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking four completed features that update job titles from 'Unreal Engine Developer' variants to 'Technical Designer' variants across the Projects and Resume sections of a portfolio site.
